title: Buzzz Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Fusion, Filipino, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Unusual for the Phillipines, an organic cafe with vegetarian options. Associated with the Bohol Bee Farm on Panglao Island. Has salads, salad with edible flowers, squash bread with mango or pesto spread, red rice, and ice cream with local flavors. Operates restaurants in Island City Mall, and on the beach at the Alona Beach Front on Panglao Island.
streetAddress: Ground floor, Galleria Luisa, Gallares St
